name: Get All Forms
description:
This is a game made for two jams

Quarantine Jam - https://itch.io/jam/quarantinejam - theme: A lot of

Weekly Game Jam 140 - https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-140 - theme: Shapeshift

In this short platformer game you can find many spirits and change yourself into their forms!

Move with arrows/WASD

Known issues below. Please let me know if you find any other! I'll try to fix them after jams end!
- if being in a form you get stuck, change form and then change back
- forms are still shown when you go back to the level even when you already collected them
- some of the forms are quite confusing, e.g. too big, too small comparing to each other (yes, this is a bunny, but a pretty BIG one XD I'll work to fix that after jams end )
